name: Grandnaders
description:
Description:

A grenade-wielding maniac has appeared with a thirst for vengeance and destruction. But, armed with a magically reappearing arsenal of grenades and a single minute, how much devastation can one individual cause?

This quick action FPS allows you to cause mayhem within the confines of a large office building. With each piece of furniture moved and every chair flipped, you gain points to your final score. Can you cause the most devastation within this space within this 60-second deadline?

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button: Throw Grenade
  • WASD:  Movement
